QuestData.Title: Wood and Shade
QuestData.Description: "Rending daggers of the great ones shall be bound with WOOD and SHADE." Hmm.$b$bI've learned a lot about the Kor'thik mantid in my time here. I know that they maintain shrines within their settlement, Kor'vess.$b$bOne is a heartroot of the very tree that they inhabit. The other is a dark pillar, connecting them with their queen.$b$bThese shrines are the wood and shade. If my predictions are right... the daggers should react in their presence.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Mark of the Empress and the Heartroot of Kypari Kor.
QuestData.RewardText: $n, look! The daggers - they've bound together, into a forked blade.$b$bWe are on the right track. I knew this wasn't a beer recipe.

Objectives.Objective: Find the Mark of the Empress
Find the Heartroot of Kypari Kor
